abstract: John Dowd, a lawyer for Raj Rajaratnam, ended by saying that all the information on which his client traded was “available to the whole world.” The prosecution’s rebuttal will continue on Monday.
snippet: John Dowd, a lawyer for Raj Rajaratnam, ended by saying that all the information on which his client traded was “available to the whole world.” The prosecution’s rebuttal will continue on Monday.

headline.main: Galleon Chief’s Lawyer Presses His Argument for Acquittal

byline.original: By Azam Ahmed and Peter Lattman
